title: God Spare the Girls
description: Journalist and features writer at Deadspin Kelsey McKinney's GOD SPARE THE GIRLS, set in North Texas, and following two sisters raised within the rigid confines of an Evangelical megachurch, who after learning a dark secret about their father—the head pastor of the church—are forced to reconsider what familial bonds are worth protecting, pitched in the vein of Curtis Sittenfeld, exploring female coming-of-age sexuality and the often gendered contradictions of faith, to Jessica Williams at William Morrow.
author: Kelsey McKinney
